attributes.action: I should like easier access to justice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Help with the problems on the subject of International and child access within the EU. I feel that there should be easily accessible information here, also funding provided to help with the situation. Language is a barrier, there should be some help, with this situation as translations are costly.

rejection.details: It is still unclear what you are requesting. Please reword your petition so that it is clear what you would specifically like the PM or Government to do.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
